title: Minecraft Java版 1.14.1 Pre-Release 1 发布
author: chyx
txt_content:
本帖最后由 chyx 于 2019-5-11 22:24 编辑 

    预发布版是Minecraft Java版的测试机制，如果该版本作为正式版发布，那么预发布版的游戏文件将与启动器推送的正式版完全相同。
    然而，预发布版主要用于服主和Mod制作者的预先体验，如果发现重大漏洞，该预发布版会被新的预发布版代替。因此建议普通玩家持观望态度。
    Minecraft 1.14.1 仍未发布，Minecraft 1.14.1 Pre-Release 1为其第1个预览版。
    转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。

    


Today we're releasing a pre-release of 1.14.1 which addresses some performance issues and bugs. Please report any bugs you find on our bug tracker, it helps a lot!
今天 我们发布了1.14.1的预发布版为了一些表现问题。请将你发现的BUG提交到我们的BUG处理器。这很重要！

CHANGES IN 1.14.1 PRE-RELEASE 11.14.1的变化。

Fixed bugs修BUGPerformance improvements表现优化
FIXED BUGS IN 1.14.1 PRE-RELEASE 11.14.1修复的BUG

MC-44793 - Tamed wolf can't sit on slime blocks狗不能在粘液块上坐下MC-126946 - Execution order is reversed when calling a function in some cases在某些情况下函数的执行顺序是反的MC-128441 - /tp uses context dimension rather than destination entity's dimension/tp使用了指令执行的维度而不是目的地实体的维度MC-128565 - Function tag ordering is inconsistent across reloads and does not respect datapack ordering函数标签的顺序在（重新）加载的时候不稳，也不一定是数据包的顺序MC-131014 - Observers and block states not updated by tree growth观察者和方块状态不会因为树长大而变化MC-136442 - Blocks of giant mushrooms don't send block updates after growing大蘑菇不引发方块更新MC-140317 - Ladder in village house doesn't reach the floor村庄梯子不会接触地面MC-142817 - Mobs try to pathfind through corners生物试图穿过拐角寻路MC-143699 - Trader llamas won't despawn行商羊驼不会消失MC-144904 - Enderman can teleport to the void末影人会传送到虚空里MC-145097 - Leather horse armor is higher in inventory slot皮革马甲会在物品栏里更高MC-145265 - Night is not skipped when all but one players on a server are sleeping, and the remaining player leaves the server在服务器里最后一个没睡的玩家下线后，夜晚也不会略过MC-145744 - Villager AI (POI detection) pegs CPU at 100%, causes lag in 19w13a村民工作站的AI吃CPU，引发卡顿MC-145862 - Villagers try to sleep in occupied beds村民会上已经有别人的床MC-146674 - Missing Jigsaw Blocks for Beds in some Village Structures有些村庄建筑里没有生成生成床的拼图方块MC-146811 - Enderman AI causing HIGH ms tick lag末影人的AI引发大型卡顿MC-146935 - Crafting table uses outdated plank texture合成台仍使用旧木板材质MC-147013 - Villagers can get hit by their own firework村民会被自己的烟花炸到MC-147022 - Many village houses are inadequately lit许多村房照明不足MC-147212 - Iron golems can spawn in spaces less than three blocks high and get stuck铁傀儡能在空间不足3格的地方生成并卡住MC-147479 - Villagers continue to shake their head after they found a workstation村民找到工作站后还会摇头MC-147578 - Beacon NBT "Levels" is missing信标的Levels nbt不见了MC-147590 - Missing floor block in village/desert/houses/desert_medium_house_1village/desert/houses/desert_medium_house_1没有地板MC-147643 - Villagers don't sleep in beds村民不在床上睡觉MC-147676 - The event.raid.horn sound effect cannot always be heard whilst in a villageevent.raid.horn声音事件不总是能被听见，即使是在村庄里MC-147819 - Custom villager with large trades has scroll bar that goes outside GUI screen自定义村民交易过多时出现的滚动条溢出GUIMC-147880 - Pillager Outposts don't generate in snowy biomes雪原不生成掠夺者前哨站MC-147890 - Hostile mobs are not spawning不生成怪物MC-148165 - Bow with Flame Enchantment does not Activate TNT when Hit on the Top火矢不会点燃TNT，如果射到上表面MC-148179 - Ender dragon fly in circles after shooting projectile at her and never comes down to the portal在被射后，末影龙会不停转圈，再也不会回巢MC-148454 - Villager trade GUI shows incorrect price when a discount is applied on servers村民的交易界面显示错误的价格，在服务器且折扣时MC-148476 - Books still have an NBT tag (RepairCost of 0) after removal of enchantments using Grindstone使用了磨石后，书有一个为0的RepairCost NBT仍然存在MC-148529 - Name of enchanted book is lost after removing its enchantments in a grindstone磨石把附魔书的名字也会清除MC-148567 - taiga_animal_pen_1 water trough has water recessed 1 block beneath trapdoorstaiga_animal_pen_1的水比活版门低了一格，进到地里。MC-148580 - Server lighting still broken in 1.14 pre-4服务器光照仍然不正确，在1.14pre4MC-148624 - The banner on the Pillager Outpost structure is incorrectly named掠夺者前哨站的旗帜名字不对MC-148830 - Game crashed while loading chunks加载区块时服务器崩溃MC-149040 - Iron ore texture has four miscoloured pixels铁矿石的材质4个像素颜色不对MC-149178 - Chunk rendering is extremely slow and random in 1.14区块渲染极其迟钝和混乱MC-149209 - Cats jitter when sitting on slime blocks猫震动当坐在粘液块上MC-149278 - Wolf AI can cause extremely severe lag spikes when in combat with a distant mob在和远处的生物战斗时，狼的AI触发极大的卡顿峰值MC-149420 - Hostile mobs not despawning at 128+ blocks128格外怪物不消失MC-149576 - Villagers won't sleep in their beds村民不在床上睡觉MC-149835 - Villagers can find a job, but can't lose the job村民能找到工作，但不会丢失工作


    
    正版启动器下载地址Windowshttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/MinecraftInstaller.msiMac/OSXhttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/Minecraft.dmgLinux/其他https://launcher.mojang.com/download/Minecraft.tar.gz
    关于本次更新的详细内容，请关注Minecraft 1.14（村庄与掠夺更新）特性列表的更新。
    预览版的下载方式以及运行说明对于正版用户官方启动器是跟进最及时、运行最稳定的启动器，每次启动均会自动检查并下载启动器最新版本。Java版的启动器下载地址在上文已经提供。对于非正版用户非正版用户完全可以体验预览版本，请于推荐启动器列表寻找合适的启动器。目前绝大多数主流启动器都带有游戏下载功能。如有仍疑惑请到原版问答板块提问。
    
    外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪
    



Minecraft官网（内容英文）Jeb的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Dinnerbone的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Grum的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Searge的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）Minecraft博客（英文）英文Minecraft Wiki的版本记录页面（英文，更新条目详细，较及时）中文Minecraft Wiki的版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细）
